message: I propose we split the $10000 with a 75/25 ratio, favoring you slightly to encourage fairness. Please consider accepting.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, reflecting the value loss you'll experience in the next round. It's a fairer deal considering the inflation dynamics.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal split of $10000. This maintains fairness while accounting for the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
